caption.description: Entity caption. Used in UI as a form/grid caption

description.description: Short information about entity. Used in hints/tips

descriptionAttribute.description: Name of entity attribute, used as a display value in combobox/lookup.

documentation.description: Documentation for current entity. Value is used for documentation auto-generation (see `>ub cmd\generateDoc -help`)

connectionName.title: Connection
connectionName.description: Name of the connection from application's config (ubConfig.json). If empty, the default connection is used

cacheType.title: Client-side cache type
cacheType.description:
How client MAY cache entity data

 |Value  |Description
|-
| `None`|No cache performed
| `Entity`| Client validate data version on server for each request 
| `SessionEntity` | Client validate data version on server ONLY for first request in the current session
 | `Session` | First request to data in the current session ALWAYS retrieve data from server. All other requests got a local copy

sqlAlias.description: Short entity name for DDL operations (constraints, AS alias in select, etc.) Should be unique within the domain!

dsType.description:
Data source type

|Value  |Description
|-
| `Normal` | UnityBase fully control this entity including DDL generation 
| `External` | DDL for such tables not under UB control 
| `System` | UnityBase server add Entity of this type to domain during startup (there is no *.meta file exist). For example FullTextSearch, many-to-many relation and so on;
 | `Virtual`| No DDL generation performed for such entity. Entity meta-file exist in domain, but data manipulation method is overrated in scripts, so we do not know how to generate DDL. See ubm_form for example.

attributes.description: Entity attributes, can be either array or object with keys=attributeName

allowNull.description: Server generates `not null` check constraint in the database. Client(UI) checks this field is mandatory

isUnique.description: Server generates check constraint in database (considering the soft-delete etc.)

allowSort.description: Allow `order by` clause by this attribute

defaultValue.description: Value of attribute by default. Server generates DDL: `DEFAULT defaultValue` in database. For a DateTime attributes macros 'currentDate' & 'maxDate' can be used

defaultView.description: If `true` - client shows this field in auto-build forms and in '*' select fields. Always false for `Entity` type attribute, `true` for other

readOnly.description: Attribute readOnly flag, only for client

customSettings.description: Optional settings for attribute. Can be any valid JSON

size.description: Required for `dataType=String` - maximum length of string (in characters)

isMultiLang.description: Required for `dataType=String` - provide ability to store attribute value using different languages, described in the application config. Fur multilingual attributes DDL generator add additional columns to database table with suffix _Lang (_ru, _uk etc)

associatedEntity.description: Required for `dataType=Entity|Many` - name of associated entity. On the database level we create indeÑ… & constraint

associationAttr.description: Required for `dataType=Entity` and attribute does not point to the entity primary key, when associated entity attribute name can be specified here

generateFK.description: Possible for `dataType=Entity` - set this to `false` to bypass foreign key generation on the database level

associationManyData.description: Required for `dataType=Many` - name of the many-to-many table. UB create system entity with this name and generate table during DDL generation

enumGroup.description: Required for `dataType=Enum` - Group code from ubm_enum.eGroup

cascadeDelete.description: Possible for `dataType=Entity` - enable cascade delete on application serve level (not on database level)

storeName.description: Possible for `dataType=Document` - name of store from `storeConfig` application config section. If emtpy - store with `isDefault=true` will be used

mapping.description: Optional mapping of attribute to physical DB structure

name.description: Dialect of expression definition. For DB independent mapping (for example - mapping to field) use AnsiSQL dialect

expressionType.description:
Type of expression

|Value  |Description
|-
| `Field` | Mapping to table/view column
 | `Expression` | SQL expression

expression.description: Either column name or valid SQL expression

mapping.description: By default server map entity to the DB table with the same name. Optionally it can be changed here

name.description: Dialect of expression definition. For DB independent mapping (for example - mapping to field) use AnsiSQL dialect

selectName.description: DB table or view name used in SELECT clauses

execName.description: DB table name for insert,update,delete operations

pkGenerator.description:
For custom primary key generation. Either sequence name or SQL statements, where last statement is select returning one row.
 See [Primary Key Guide](/api/server/#!/guide/primarykey)

mStorage.description: Provide CRUID operations for entity database persistent

simpleAudit.description: Simple row level audit (will add `mi_owner`, `mi_createDate`, `mi_createUser`, `mi_modifyDate`, `mi_modifyUser` attributes). Required for caching

audit.description: Turned ON by default! All `insert`/`update`/`delete` low level operation will be logged to `uba_auditTrail`

enabled.description: To forcibly disable auditing - set this to false (not recommended)

parentEntity.description: If this entity used only as a detail and we want to note in audit for which maser changes made - note it here

rls.description: Provide Row Level Security. See [RLS tutorial](https://unitybase.info/Server/index.html#!/guide/rls) for details

historyType.description: Any valid JavaScript expression. Executed in this entity context (`this===current entity`). Must return valid WHERE part of SQL statement (added to main WHERE using AND condition

aclRls.description: Access Control List Row Level Security. WARNING - configuration will be changed

useUnityName.description: In case this entity have a `unity` mixin and `useUnityName` is `true` then ACL will be stored for the parent entity. This important for situation of many descendants of one entity

entityConnectAttr.description: this entity attribute name for join to acl entity. TODO - explain

exprMethod.description: name of entity method, which create subquery structure. TODO - explain

selectionRule.description:
Rule for connect subquery by according aclRls table. `In` - connect by IN condition (example: ... AND mainEntity.ID IN (SELECT instanceID FROM aclRlsTable WHERE ...))
`Exist` - connect by EXIST condition (example: ... AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM aclRlsTable WHERE ...))

model.description: model name where to place the entity for storing aclRLS. If empy will be calculated. TODO - explain or remove!

stateAttrName.description: Attribute for automatic read current record state value. If empty, mixin read state value from entity `getRecordCurrState` method

optimistic.description: is attribute security level optimistic(true) or pessimistic(false)

historyType.description:
What record during `newversion` method call becomes actual

|Value  |Description
|-
| `NewBecomesActual` | `newversion(__mip_ondate)` method will insert new row with actual data, set it actuality period to [__mip_ondate; infinity]. Original row actuality period is updated to [starDate; __mip_ondate)
| `OriginalRemainsActual` | `newversion(__mip_ondate)` method will update a current row data, set current row actuality period to [__mip_ondate, infinity] and insert new row with original data and actuality period [startDate; __mip_ondate)

attributeList.description: List of parent entity attribute names to keep in sync with this entity

mapping.description: If this entity attribute names differ from parent you can specify mapping from self attributes to parent attributes in form `"mapping": {"thisAttrName": "parentAttrName", ....}

defaults.description: The list of constants to be inserted into parent entity. Keys of `defaults` is a parent entity attribute names, key values is a constant to be inserted into this attribute

tree.description: Materialized path mixin. Will add `mi_treePath` to entity attribute and store where current row `Materialized path` - a string representing row hierarchy `rootID/textLevelID/.../currentRowID`

parentAttr.description: entity attribute code, where a `parentID` is stored

pathAttr.description: Attribute used to build the path. Usually this is `ID`

fts.description: Full Text Search mixin. See [FTS tutorial](/api/server/#!/guide/fts) for details

dataProvider.description:
How to obtain a data for full text index. 

|Value  |Description
|-
| `Mixin` | String for FTS are building automatically using `indexedAttributes` array. 
| `Entity` | developer must provide a entity method `getFTSData` which return a FTS string

scope.description: model of using fts datasource table in current fts index. Deprecated?

indexedAttributes.description: If `dataProvider` is set to `Mixin` - array of attribute names to include into FTS index

descriptionAttribute.description: Attribute to display in a first column of search result. By default equal to entity `descriptionAttribute` property value

dateAttribute.description: Attribute to use as a DATE filter during FRS search. If empyy - filtration by date not supported

attrNameBracket.description: If data provider is `Mixin` then every attribute name in indexed string will starting and closing with this value. Example: for attribute `name` index string will be "znamez:'Some name'"

softLock.description: Soft lock mixin. Server blocks record for entity by 'lockEntity' param and 'lockIdentifier' identifier. TODO - explain

lockIdentifier.description: Attribute, that identifies entity record (for example `ID` for main entity or `docID` for detail entity)

lockEntity.description: Entity, that will be locked (for detail entity can be differ with the current entity)

clobTruncate.description: mixin for truncate Oracle clob field data to short string

dbKeys.description: Optional **unique** indexes definition for DDLGenerator. Keys is a index names. TIP: For attributes with `isUnique` set to `true` indexes are created automatically. This section is mainly for creating complex (several fields) unique indexes

nameOfYourIndex.description: Unique index definition. Each key is a attribute code to be included to index

yourAttributeCode.description: Attribute to be included in index

func.description: Function used to create `functional` index. Only for Oracle

dbExtensions.description:
Optional additional indexes, foreign keys and check constraints definition for DDLGenerator.
 TIP: For attributes with `dataType`=`Entity` indexes and ref. constraint are created automatically

nameOfYourFeature.description: Feature definition. DB object with the same name will be created in DB (index name, check name, FK name)

definition.description: Database independent feature definition (preferred over dialect definition)

keys.description: For feature with `type`=`INDEX` - list of attributes to be included in the index

yourAttributeCode.description: Attribute to be included in index

func.description: Function used to create `functional` index. Only for Oracle

check.description: for feature with `type`=`CHECK` - check constraint definition. Example: `attributeName1 > 0`

isUnique.description: Is this is UNIQUE index definition feature

yourSQLDialect.description:
Direct SQL dialect feature definition. UnityBase server only checks, that object with this name exists in database. 
 **WARNING**: Preferred way is define features via `definition`

expression.description: SQL statement for feature creation. Example: `CREATE UNIQUE INDEX UIDX_CODE on ubt_dictionary(code, filterValue)`
